online.game
Class commonPlayer

java.lang.Object
  online.game.commonPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageAdapter, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, CompareTo<commonPlayer>, UniversalConstants, Play2Constants, PlayConstants
public class commonPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageAdapter, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, Play2Constants, CompareTo<commonPlayer>

this class holds information about players. It's used by both the game controller and the game client. Rectangles defined in the player object should be laid out by the game's exCanvas.setLocalBounds(int, int, int, int) method

changePlayerList

public static commonPlayer[] changePlayerList(commonPlayer[] seedlist,
                                              commonPlayer p,
                                              commonPlayer replace,
                                              boolean expand)
add to a list of commonPlayer, extending if necessary. If both P and Replace are null, the list is cleared to all nulls.

Parameters:
seedlist -
p - if not null, is added to the list
replace - if not null, is replaced by p
Returns:
a new list, or null if no room and no expansion

isAsyncAdapter

public boolean isAsyncAdapter()
Description copied from interface: ImageAdapter
Return true if the adapter should work on a separate thread to avoid blocking the EDT this is especially important for image masks and heavy image manipulation

Specified by:
isAsyncAdapter in interface ImageAdapter
Returns:
true to run off the EDT
